name: XWUI Watermark Component
description: Watermark overlay component for displaying text or image watermarks on content. Supports text watermarks with custom fonts, colors, rotation, gaps, offsets, and image watermarks. Useful for branding and content protection.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

content.description: Watermark text content (string or array of strings for multi-line)

gap.description: Gap between watermarks as [x, y] in pixels

offset.description: Offset of first watermark as [x, y] in pixels

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the watermark

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

image.description: Image URL for image watermark (alternative to text content)
